title: 31: The Kitchen Front
itunes:title: The Kitchen Front
description: In this episode of The Readheads Book Club the girls are recapping and discussing The Kitchen Front by Jennifer Ryan. They're sharing their favorite and least favorite aspects as well as answer questions from the listeners about the book. Plus, as always, each host shares what other books she read this month and her thoughts on each. The next book is Dana's choice and she chose The Midnight Library by Matt Haig. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com Shop Readheads Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/collections/the-readheads The overall Readheads Rating for The Kitchen Front is 3.2 stars.
